data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Milan to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
In the minute 2, Cagliari needs to be cautious. Milan have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Milan.
Milan surge into the attack at Giuseppe Meazza but Theo Hernandez’s header is off-target.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Cagliari at Giuseppe Meazza.
Milan have a dangerous throw-in.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 7, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Ball goes out of play for a Milan goal kick.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Cagliari at Giuseppe Meazza.
Ragnar Klavan blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-0.
Free kick for Milan in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ismael Bennacer is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Gaston Pereiro for Cagliari has been booked by Marco Serra and receives a first yellow card.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
In the minute 14, Milan's Ismael Bennacer looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Milan's Samu Castillejo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Milan have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Milan in the half of Cagliari.
Corner awarded to Milan.
In the minute 21, Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Cagliari defence as Zlatan Ibrahimovic fires in a strike for Milan.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
In the minute 23, Zlatan Ibrahimovic of Milan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Milan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Rafael Leao (Milan) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 24, Marco Serra awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Marco Serra signals a Cagliari throw-in in Milan's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Milan.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Milan's half?
In the minute 28, Free kick for Milan in their own half.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Throw-in Milan.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Milan in their own half.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, The match at Giuseppe Meazza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Rafael Leao, who is down injured.
Milan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 36, Cagliari are coming forward and Gaston Pereiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Milan have a goal kick.
Ismael Bennacer of Milan gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 38, Goal kick for Cagliari at Giuseppe Meazza.
Rafael Leao (Milan) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Giacomo Bonaventura.
Free kick for Milan in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 40, Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Milan.
Cagliari drives forward and Gaston Pereiro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 43, Milan have been awarded a penalty...
A massive blow for Milan as Zlatan Ibrahimovic misses from the spot.
Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Milan.
In the minute 45, Marco Serra signals a free kick to Milan.
Marco Serra will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Milan have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Milan territory.
In the minute 45, Marco Serra signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Milan's area.
The first half has been concluded at Giuseppe Meazza.
At Giuseppe Meazza, Paolo Farago has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Marco Serra has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Marco Serra blows against Milan's Giacomo Bonaventura for offside.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Milan's half?
Milan's Hakan Calhanoglu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 50, Milan needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Milan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 53, Simon Kjaer (Milan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Marco Serra awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Goal! Milan extend their lead to 2-0 through Zlatan Ibrahimovic.
In the minute 55, That's a fine assist from Samu Castillejo.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Goal! Samu Castillejo extends Milan's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 57, Giacomo Bonaventura instrumental with a fine assist.
Cagliari's Alessio Cragno has been booked in Milan.
Giovanni Simeone (Cagliari) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 61, Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Gaston Pereiro for Cagliari drives towards goal at Giuseppe Meazza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Cagliari at Giuseppe Meazza.
Andrea Carboni is replacing Ragnar Klavan for the away team.
Walter Zenga (Cagliari) is making a second substitution, with Riccardo Ladinetti replacing Federico Mattiello.
In the minute 62, Cagliari make their first substitution with Alberto Paloschi replacing Gaston Pereiro.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Stefano Pioli is making the team's second substitution at Giuseppe Meazza with Daniel Maldini replacing Samu Castillejo.
The home team have replaced Hakan Calhanoglu with Alexis Saelemaekers. This is the third substitution made today by Stefano Pioli.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Milan.
The home team replace Ismael Bennacer with Marco Brescianini.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 67, Marco Serra awards the home team a throw-in.
Alexis Saelemaekers (Milan) has received a first yellow card.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Throw-in Cagliari.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Milan.
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Milan.
In Milan, Theo Hernandez of Milan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 74, Marco Serra signals a Cagliari throw-in in Milan's half.
In Milan Milan attack through Giacomo Bonaventura. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Milan.
Marco Serra awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, Federico Marigosu is on a sub for Artur Ionita for Cagliari.
Leo Duarte is on a sub for Simon Kjaer for Milan.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Serra signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In Milan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Milan.
Throw-in high up the field for Milan in Milan.
Marco Serra signals a Milan throw-in in Cagliari's half.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Milan.
Free kick Cagliari.
Cagliari push upfield and Paolo Farago gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Milan defence.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Serra.
Milan have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Giuseppe Meazza. The final score is 3-0.
The away team replace Giovanni Simeone with Leonardo Pavoletti.
